title: TikTok lands first major ally on Capitol Hill: Democratic Rep. Jamaal Bowman
description: Rep. Jamaal Bowman has emerged as a rare ally for TikTok in Congress, denouncing attempts to ban it and calling arguments that it is dangerous as "fear-mongering."

title: Inside the rural Texas resistance to the GOP’s private school choice plan
description: Rural public school leaders warn against Texas private school voucher plan

title: Anti-porn bills in 8 states could force device makers to censor sexual material
description: Bill that would mandate tech companies automatically turn on filters on pornography are spreading across the country.

title: Jan. 6 rioter who used GoPro to film himself jumping through broken Capitol window sentenced
description: Anthony Puma, who filmed himself with a GoPro jumping through a broken window to storm the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, was sentenced to 9 months in prison on Tuesday.

title: Birth control methods that use one hormone raise breast cancer risk as much as those with a combo, study finds
description: Birth control methods that use one hormone or a combination of two can all raise breast cancer risk by similar amounts, research suggests.

title: TikTok bans deepfakes of young people as it updates guidelines
description: TikTok went on a counteroffensive Tuesday amid increasing Western pressure over cybersecurity and misinformation concerns.

title: Google rolls out it's ChatGPT answer, 'Bard,' to some users
description: Google announced Tuesday it’s allowing more people to interact with "Bard," the artificially intelligent chatbot the company is building to counter Microsoft’s early lead in a pivotal battleground of technology.

title: Top Republican says he returned donations from a recent fundraiser at Signature Bank headquarters
description: Rep. Patrick McHenry, who will lead a House investigation into the Signature Bank and SVB collapses, said he returned all donations from a Signature fundraiser.

title: Fox News producer alleges network coerced her to give misleading testimony on Dominion
description: A Fox News producer is suing the network, alleging its lawyers coerced her into providing misleading testimony in Dominion Voting Systems’ defamation lawsuit.

title: Home sales spike 14.5% in February as the median price drops for the first time in over a decade
description: Sales of previously owned homes rose 14.5% in February compared with January, according to a seasonally adjusted count by the National Association of Realtors.

title: Beyoncé tickets in the U.S. are so expensive that some fans are flying to Europe instead
description: Tickets to see Beyoncé in the U.S. are so expensive that some American fans are flying to Europe instead.

title: Google suspends Chinese shopping app amid security concerns
description: Google has suspended the Chinese shopping app Pinduoduo on its app store after malware was discovered in versions of the app from other sources.

title: Video shows Virginia deputies and medical workers appearing to pile on top of Irvo Otieno before his death
description: Video capturing some of the final moments in the life of Irvo Otieno — the Virginia man whose death led to murder charges against seven deputies — shows several officers and medical staff appearing to pile on top of the 28-year-old Black man before he eventually stops moving.

title: Xi's trip to Russia boosts 'dear friend' Putin as China pushes back against U.S. power
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping’s trip to Moscow is a symbolic shot in the arm for Russian President Vladimir Putin, and underscores their goal to counter the U.S.

title: Va. teacher describes springing to action after 6-year-old shot her: 'I just wanted to get my babies out'
description: The Jan. 6 school day seemed normal to Abigail Zwerner, a first grade teacher in Newport News, Virginia, until she heard rumblings that one of her students had a gun.

title: Porn stars and grooming allegations: Trump-DeSantis cold war heats up as indictment looms
description: Donald Trump's allies have been going after Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis for how he has responded to the possibility that the former president might get indicted.

title: Dominion Voting Systems and Fox News face key hurdles in defamation suit hearing
description: Dominion Voting Systems will face a key hurdle in its effort to recover $1.6 billion from Fox News and Fox Corp. during a summary judgment hearing Tuesday.

title: Trump ally tries to undercut Michael Cohen with testimony in hush money probe
description: A key Trump ally testified before a grand jury and attempted to discredit earlier testimony from Michael Cohen in a probe that could lead to Trump's indictment.
